title: december 27: the birth of a music hall
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the grand opening of Radio City Music Hall, as well as the background of the epic building and some fun spooky history. She also chats about an interesting leak in a Jackson family performance contract. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
